abilities.name: Flare Condition
abilities.effect: As long as Arcanine has any Fire Energy attached to it, Arcanine has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Burn Out
attacks.effect: You may do 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, Arcanine is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flames of Rage
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Arcanine. This attack does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Arcanine.
